name: Drowned in Blood
description: The new restaurant bounie's burgers, opened, all good.... but after about 3 months people began to notice that a putrid smell came from the vents...the burger joint, they knew that they could discover their secrets that they've been suspicious for months...so they switched your drinks stall to a stranger...they told you you'd have to watch the vents, and put up with the bad smell...you ask them about the smell, but they just say you won't Complain or they will take care of you.  And so, all goes well, until red lights appear out of nowhere... you think your imagination, and so begins your terrifying adventure into the bounie's burgers vents....
